mcq.statement: Which of the following statements is true? NaOH is named as caustic soda because it reacts with fats to form soap, Alkali metal hydroxides are stable to heat except KOH, CaOH is a stronger base than NaOH, When NaOH is made the gas released at the cathode is Cl2

options.a: NaOH is named as caustic soda because it reacts with fats to form soap
options.b: Alkali metal hydroxides are stable to heat except KOH
options.c: CaOH is a stronger base than NaOH
options.d: When NaOH is made the gas released at the cathode is Cl2
